results.description: Uses immediate post-news return to capture momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min + news_pct_5_min). SUGGESTION2: not applied (no vector fields used). SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_pct_1min userCount/alphaCount moderate). Kept implementation short and <=2 datafields. confidence=0.75

Fade large 1-minute moves expecting reversal. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage good). SUGGESTION4: applied (vol_stddev high userCount). Kept to 2 datafields and 3 operators. confidence=0.70

Capture drift relative to SPY to remove market moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_spy_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (both widely used). Implementation short. confidence=0.72

Trade continuation when current volume >> moving volume. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_curr_vol & news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4: applied (mov_vol high userCount). Kept simple. confidence=0.78

Exploit momentum when open gaps persist. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap & news_open). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_open_gap coverage ~0.6247 (>0.6) so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: partially applied (open_gap lower userCount). Kept <=2 fields. confidence=0.65

Long earnings beats that show positive immediate reaction. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual & news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: applied (eps_actual high alphaCount). confidence=0.80

Favor moves when ATR ratio is high indicating true breakout. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_atr_ratio & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4: applied (atr fields high usage). Kept to 2 fields. confidence=0.68

Mean-revert shorted names after large immediate drops. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_short_interest & news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage short_interest high; no backfill. SUGGESTION4: applied (short_interest reasonable userCount). confidence=0.66

Scale alpha by recent volume volatility to avoid noise. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min & news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4: vol_stddev has good alphaCount. confidence=0.71

Use news_indx_perf to capture stock-specific outperformance. SUGGESTION1: used news_indx_perf alone (keeps implementation minimal). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied (high alphaCount). confidence=0.74

Trade towards EOD VWAP when price deviates strongly intraday. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_vwap & news_ton_last). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

Chain 1min and 5min returns to favor persistent moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_pct_5_min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.67

Fade extreme session ranges when range_stddev high. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_range_stddev & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_range_stddev coverage ~0.6172 (>0.6) so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. confidence=0.64

Use pre_vwap strength to predict open continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pre_vwap & news_open). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: pre_vwap coverage high. SUGGESTION4: pre_vwap lower userCount but used. confidence=0.62

Capture gap that outperforms SPY after earnings. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap & news_spy_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: open_gap coverage ~0.6247 so OK. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70

results.idea: Fast mean reversion using ton last
results.description: Fade immediate move from TONLast to EOD close. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last & news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both high coverage. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

Momentum scaled by Curr_Vol/Mov_Vol to avoid thin-volume noise. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_ratio_vol coverage ~0.5122 (<0.6) so applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: ratio_vol userCount moderate. confidence=0.66

Exploit large tick counts indicating strong activity. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_tot_ticks & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: tot_ticks coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied (tot_ticks high userCount). confidence=0.73

Short when max_up_ret is large but subsequent momentum wanes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret & news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. confidence=0.60

Long when price crosses above eod_vwap with volume surge. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_vwap & news_curr_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: curr_vol coverage ~0.7769 (>0.6). SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.74
Bet on stocks with extreme news_pct_1min vs peers. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min alone with quantile). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: used. confidence=0.69
Reduce exposure when SPY volatility high. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_spy_last). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

Require 1min and 3min returns aligned for signal. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_mins_3_chg interpreted via pct). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.9. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70

Exploit decay of initial reaction over 120 minutes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_120min & news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.63

Large caps with positive immediate reaction tend to continue. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_cap & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.7. SUGGESTION4: cap has high userCount/alphaCount applied. confidence=0.76

Fade to vwap when session range is extreme. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_session_range_pct & news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: session_range_pct coverage low (~0.268) so applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: used. confidence=0.55

Use pre_vwap trend to trade at open continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pre_vwap & news_open_gap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: pre_vwap coverage good; open_gap ~0.6247 OK. SUGGESTION4: partially applied. confidence=0.61

Favor reactions in reasonably valued stocks. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min & news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: pe_ratio coverage high. SUGGESTION4: pe_ratio high userCount applied. confidence=0.68

results.idea: Large-up move follow-through with low previous return
results.description: Continue up-moves when previous day weak. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret & news_prev_day_ret). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: prev_day_ret coverage >0.73. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

results.idea: Post-news strength weighted by market cap
results.description: Larger cap names' moves carry more information. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_60min & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.75

Fade extreme 30-second moves expecting microstructure noise. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30sec & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.64

Use prenews 1min changes to anticipate open reaction. SUGGESTION1: applied (nws12_prez_1_minute & nws12_prez_prevday). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage moderate (>0.4) so no backfill applied to keep data freshness. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.58
Capture stock-specific moves versus index post-news. SUGGESTION1: applied (nws12_mainz_result_vs_index). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.77

results.idea: Post-news micro momentum with volume ratio
results.description: Require both positive 5min return and high vol ratio. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min & news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: ratio_vol <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.65

results.idea: Earnings gap mean reversion scaled by ATR
results.description: Fade earnings gap if ATR ratio low (move not justified). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap & news_atr_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage sufficient. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

Favor names with strong 120min and 90min moves alignment. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_120min & news_pct_90min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72

Avoid signals in names with low mov_vol relative to ticks. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mov_vol & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: mov_vol coverage >0.8. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.60

results.idea: Short-term continuation if minute counts low
results.description: When minutes to 1% move high, trend may be stable. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_1_pct_up & news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: mins_1_pct_up coverage ~0.1857 (<0.6) so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: userCount modest. confidence=0.50

results.idea: Large cap reversal after intraday extreme
results.description: Fade extremes in large caps measured by high range stddev. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_cap & news_range_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: range_stddev ~0.6172 ok. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.67

results.idea: Pre-open momentum scaled by prev close gap
results.description: Favor premarket strength with small prev close gaps. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pre_vwap & news_prev_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: prev_close coverage low (~0.1728) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: prev_close low userCount. confidence=0.52

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by PE and cap
results.description: Combine return with valuation to avoid overpaying. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70

Require alignment across horizons for robustness. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.96. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.73

Scale return by ATR to normalize across vol regimes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_atr14/news_atr_ratio). Chose news_atr14. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: atr14 coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72
Require current vol much higher than moving vol. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_curr_vol & news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.7. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.76

results.idea: Short post-up move in high short-interest
results.description: Fade large ups in names with high short interest (squeeze risk managed). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret & news_short_interest). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.63

Buy when TONLast near session low anticipating recovery to EODHigh. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last & news_eod_high). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.65

results.idea: Microstructure trend after high tick density
results.description: Use tick surge + 5min return for momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_tot_ticks & news_pct_5_min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.71

results.idea: Pre-open gap fade in low tick names
results.description: Fade gaps in low activity names (avoid squeezes). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: tot_ticks coverage high; open_gap borderline. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.56

Require both 1min and 30min positive to validate momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.74

results.idea: Post-news persistence adjusted by days volatility (ts_ir)
results.description: Use information ratio of recent returns to isolate persistent moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (ts_ir on news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.73

results.idea: Fade to post_vwap when large down move
results.description: Buy when price well below post_vwap after a drop. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_post_vwap & news_max_dn_ret). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: post_vwap coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

Simple momentum but flagged to be group-neutralized in portfolio engine (we don't use group op here to respect KEEP_IN_MIND). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

Weight short-term return by current volume to favor liquid moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_curr_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: curr_vol coverage >0.77. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.74

results.idea: Fast breakout in low PE stocks
results.description: Prefer continuations in low PE to avoid speculative spikes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min & news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: pe_ratio coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

Use prev_day_ret and ton_last to detect continuation into close. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_day_ret & news_ton_last). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: prev_day_ret coverage ~0.73. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.65

Reduce exposure in high ATR names to control risk. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_atr14 & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: atr14 coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70
Require both 10min and 30min returns aligned. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72

Require move away from post_vwap in same direction as pct_30min. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_post_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.71

results.idea: Earnings move scaled by market cap median
results.description: Normalize earnings reaction by market cap to avoid small-cap noise. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.78

results.idea: Fast fade when tots ticks low (no activity)
results.description: Fade moves when total ticks low indicating illiquidity. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: tot_ticks coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.59

Weight signals by provider reliability (provider index present but treated as proxy). SUGGESTION1: applied (nws12_mainz_provider & nws12_mainz_result1). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: provider coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied but provider is categorical so use it only as filter in engine. Here minimal usage. confidence=0.54

results.idea: Momentum in names with rising volstddev
results.description: Prefer moves accompanied by volume stddev increase. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72

results.idea: Rapid follow-through for very large up moves (max_up_ret)
results.description: Ride the largest intraday upswings selectively. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret & news_curr_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.67

If 1min and 10min returns diverge, fade noisy signals. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.61

results.idea: Post-news range breakout scaled by mov_vol
results.description: Use session range magnitude with volume normalization. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_session_range & news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: session_range coverage low (~0.4236) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.53

results.idea: Momentum weighted by ticks per minute
results.description: Favor moves with high tick frequency. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70

results.idea: Short-term reversal after high minute pct up count
results.description: Fade when many minutes reached 1% up quickly (overbought). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_1_chg & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: mins_1_chg coverage ~0.9175 good. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.62

Use pre-open strength but reduce when previous day's volume high (reduces novelty). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pre_vwap & news_prev_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: prev_vol coverage low (~0.0374) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: prev_vol low userCount so confidence lowered. confidence=0.49

Buy stocks that outperform index after news. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_result_vs_index & news_pct_60min). Using nws12_mainz_result_vs_index. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.75

results.idea: Momentum with winsorization to reduce outliers
results.description: Apply winsorize on pct_30min to control outliers. SUGGESTION1: applied (winsorize(news_pct_30min) & news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

results.idea: Fast-breakout only when prev close weak
results.description: Require previous day low prevclose-based weakness for continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_prev_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: prev_close coverage low so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: applied cautiously. confidence=0.54

results.idea: Large-up move follow-through when market neutral
results.description: Favor stock outperformance relative to SPY post large up move. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret & news_indx_perf). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.71
Fade 30sec moves that reverse within 1min. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30sec & news_pct_1min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.96. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.63

results.idea: Momentum filtered by 30min z-score across cross-section
results.description: Use quantile of 30min zscore to trade extremes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.74

results.idea: High-magnitude move follow-through with volume confirmation
results.description: Require both large pct_120min and volume surge. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_120min & news_curr_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.73

results.idea: Fade extreme after hours moves into open
results.description: Fade big after-hours percent changes when not confirmed pre-open. SUGGESTION1: applied (nws12_afterhsz_1_minute & nws12_prez_prevday). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage moderate; used ts_backfill for any low coverage. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.57

results.idea: Momentum with size neutrality via divide by cap
results.description: Normalize return by market cap to avoid small-cap bias. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both high coverage. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72

results.idea: Immediate surge then fade when vol stddev low
results.description: Fade moves if volume spike not accompanied by high vol stddev. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min & news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

results.idea: Post-news continuation only in high-liquidity names
results.description: Filter momentum by mov_vol threshold. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: mov_vol coverage >0.8. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.75

Buy names that hit large post-news lows expecting bounce. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_dn_ret & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

results.idea: Momentum scaled by minutes to 10% move
results.description: Favor stocks that move quickly but not too quickly (filter extremes). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_10_chg & news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: mins_10_chg coverage ~0.7395 OK. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.60

Fade when 5min strong but 60min weak (short-term spike). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min & news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.63

results.idea: Volatility breakout followed by trend filter
results.description: Require atrratio high and 30min positive for signal. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_atr_ratio & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.7. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.71

results.idea: Earnings reaction paired with pe ratio sanity check
results.description: Accept large earnings moves only if PE not extreme. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual & news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.77

results.idea: Post-news drift momentum for low short interest
results.description: Prefer continuation in names with low short interest to avoid squeeze reversals. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_short_interest). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.8. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

Require direction agreement between 3-min and 5-min buckets. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_3_chg & news_mins_5_chg). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.91. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

Use provider reliability as a soft filter (provider index present but not used directly here to respect simplicity). SUGGESTION1: minimal (nws12_prez_provider not used to avoid categorical logic). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: provider coverage high but categorical. SUGGESTION4: skipped. confidence=0.45
Trade cross-sectional extremes on 90min return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_90min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.73

results.idea: Open gap continuation in high ticks
results.description: Require high tick activity to follow through on open gaps. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage okay. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

Winsorize volume to downweight extreme spikes. SUGGESTION1: applied (winsorize(news_curr_vol) & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70

results.idea: Strong move continuation only if not newrecord duplicate
results.description: Prefer first-instance news (nws12_allz_newrecord) to avoid stale duplicates; here we use result1 only when newrecord==1 in engine (flag). SUGGESTION1: noted but not encoded to keep implementation short. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: newrecord coverage high. SUGGESTION4: skipped in impl. confidence=0.50

results.idea: Post-news momentum filtered by prevday weakness
results.description: Require previous day weak performance for stronger continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_day_ret & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.67

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum scaled by ticks
results.description: Require spike in ticks to confirm earnings-driven moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.76
Use ts_zscore over a longer window to smooth noise for momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.71

results.idea: Large cap fade after extreme one-day move
results.description: Fade extreme day moves in large caps (mean reversion). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_day_ret & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

results.idea: Momentum only if eod_vwap divergence supports it
results.description: Require move direction aligned with separation from eod_vwap. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70
Cross-sectional extremes of ultra-short returns. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30sec & news_pct_1min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

results.idea: Continuation when both tonlast and eodhigh indicate upside
results.description: Combine proximity to eodhigh with positive 30min returns. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last & news_eod_high). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.64

results.idea: Momentum with simple winsorize on returns
results.description: Robust momentum by winsorizing short-term returns. SUGGESTION1: applied (winsorize(news_pct_60min)). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72

Require ultra-short and short alignment for intraday trades. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30sec & news_pct_5_min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverages varied but acceptable. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.65

Favor moves when distance from vwap increases signifying conviction. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.69

results.idea: Earnings momentum only in low volatility names
results.description: Prefer earnings continuations in stocks with low recent ATR. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual & news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.73

results.idea: Micro mean reversion with tick normalization
results.description: Normalize 1min move by tick count and fade if low ticks. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.62

results.idea: Post-news continuation in names with prior low returns
results.description: Favor continuation when previous day was weak (mean reversion turned momentum). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_day_ret & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.66

results.idea: Volume surge breakout but require mov_vol support
results.description: Only trade breakouts when both current volume high and mov_vol non-negligible. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_curr_vol & news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.7. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.75

Fade when high_exc_stddev indicates extreme deviation from recent closes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_high_exc_stddev & news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

Prefer continuation when prior vol low (ts_std_dev low) using atr14 as proxy. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_60min & news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.71

results.idea: Immediate momentum scaled by eod_vwap gap
results.description: Require momentum plus large gap from eod_vwap to validate. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.70

results.idea: Post-news momentum only for top cap decile
results.description: Filter to top cap names (cap used as weight; explicit grouping not used here). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.74

results.idea: Micro momentum but reduce for high PE
results.description: Fade ultra-short moves in very high PE names. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30sec & news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.63

Use product of 120min return and tick activity to select persistent moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_120min & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.73
Fade spikes in small caps by normalizing with cap. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.61

results.idea: After-news trend only when volstddev confirms
results.description: Require both return and volstddev alignment. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_60min & news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.72

results.idea: Micro mean reversion when 3min move extreme
results.description: Fade extreme 3min moves expecting quick reversal. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_3_chg & news_pct_5_min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.60

results.idea: Earnings gap continuation only with high ticks
results.description: Require tick confirmation for earnings-driven gaps. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage OK. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

Use winsorized 30min return and subtract market zscore to be neutral. SUGGESTION1: applied (winsorize(news_pct_30min) & news_spy_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.74

results.idea: Fast reversal when mins_5_pct_up is small
results.description: If it took many minutes to move up, the move is weaker; fade accordingly. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_5_pct_up & news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: mins_5_pct_up coverage ~0.9214 good. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.59

Require alignment of 10min, 30min, and 60min returns for high conviction. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_pct_30min) and (news_pct_60min used as third in logical AND but kept to 2 fields per requirement by using two at a time across variants). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.76

results.idea: Large cap micro momentum filter by ticks
results.description: Require tick activity for micro moves in large caps. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min & news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.68

results.idea: Fade when early percent move not sustained to 120min
results.description: If early spike dissipates by 120min, fade the initial direction. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min & news_pct_120min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.64

results.idea: Earnings reaction scaled by market cap and ticks
results.description: Require both cap and tick confirmation for earnings moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual & news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high. SUGGESTION4: applied. confidence=0.77
